description: Speaker Recognition APIs are cloud-based APIs that provide the most advanced algorithms for speaker verification and speaker identification. Speaker Recognition can be divided into two categories: speaker verification and speaker identification.

blocks.name: createIdentificationEnrollment
blocks.description: Enrollment for speaker identification is text-independent, which means that there are no restrictions on what the speaker says in the audio. The speaker's voice is recorded, and a number of features are extracted to form a unique voiceprint.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: shortAudio
args.info: Instruct the service to waive the recommended minimum audio limit needed for enrollment. Set value to “true” to force enrollment using any audio length (min. 1 second).

args.name: identificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker identification profile. GUID returned from Identification Profile - Create Profile API.

args.name: file
args.info: The audio file format must meet the following requirements.

blocks.name: createIdentificationProfile
blocks.description: Create a new speaker identification profile with specified locale. One subscription can only create 1000 speaker verification/identification profiles at most.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: locale
args.info: Locale for the language of this speaker identification profile. Must be: en-US or zh-CN

blocks.name: deleteIdentificationProfile
blocks.description: Deletes both speaker identification profile and all associated enrollments permanently from the service.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: identificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker identification profile. GUID returned from Identification Profile - Create Profile API

blocks.name: getAllIdentificationProfiles
blocks.description: Get all speaker identification profiles within the subscription.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

blocks.name: getSingleIdentificationProfile
blocks.description: Get a speaker identification profile by identificationProfileId.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: identificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker identification profile. GUID returned from Identification Profile - Create Profile API

blocks.name: deleteIdentificationProfileEnrollments
blocks.description: Deletes all enrollments associated with the given speaker identification profile permanently from the service.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: identificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker identification profile. GUID returned from Identification Profile - Create Profile API

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: operationId
args.info: The operation Id, created by Speaker Recognition - Identification or Identification Profile - Create Enrollment.

blocks.name: getSpeakerIdentification
blocks.description: To automatically identify who is speaking given a group of speakers.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: identificationProfileIds
args.info: Comma-delimited identificationProfileIds, the id should be Guid. It can only support at most 10 profiles for one identification request.

args.name: shortAudio
args.info: Instruct the service to waive the recommended minimum audio limit needed for identification. Set value to “true” to force identification using any audio length (min. 1 second).

args.name: file
args.info: The audio file format must meet the following requirements.

blocks.name: getSpeakerVerification
blocks.description: To automatically verify and authenticate users using their voice or speech.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: verificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker verification profile. It should be a GUID.

args.name: file
args.info: The audio file format must meet the following requirements.

blocks.name: getAllSupportedVerificationPhrases
blocks.description: Returns the list of supported verification phrases.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: locale
args.info: Locale for the language when retrieving verification phrases..

blocks.name: createVerificationEnrollment
blocks.description: Enrollment for speaker verification is text-dependent, which means speaker need to choose a specific phrase to use in both enrollment and verification. List of supported phrases can be found in Verification Phrase - List All Supported Verification Phrases.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: verificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker verification profile. GUID returned from Verification Profile - Create Profile API

args.name: file
args.info: The audio file format must meet the following requirements.

blocks.name: createVerificationProfile
blocks.description: Create a new speaker verification profile with specific locale.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: locale
args.info: Locale for language of the new speaker verification profile. Must be: en-US

blocks.name: deleteVerificationProfile
blocks.description: Deletes both speaker verification profile and all associated enrollments permanently from the service.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: verificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker verification profile. It should be a GUID.

blocks.name: getAllVerificationProfiles
blocks.description: Get all speaker verification profiles within the subscription.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

blocks.name: getSingleVerificationProfile
blocks.description: Get a speaker verification profile by verificationProfileId.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: verificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker verification profile. It should be a GUID.

blocks.name: deleteVerificationProfileEnrollments
blocks.description: Deletes all enrollments associated with the given speaker’s verification profile permanently from the service.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: Subscription key which provides access to this API. Found in your Cognitive Services accounts.

args.name: verificationProfileId
args.info: ID of speaker verification profile. It should be a GUID.
